name: slither-backend
description: Minimal Slither-like backend in TypeScript with fixed 30ms tick and WebSocket server

scripts.kill-8080: powershell -NoProfile -ExecutionPolicy Bypass -Command "$p=(Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 8080 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue).OwningProcess; if($p){Stop-Process -Id $p -Force; Write-Output "Killed PID $p"} else { Write-Output "No process on 8080" }"
